waypoints.onload:
scripts = { ['event'] = '/Events/TruhenEvent.xml', ['parcour'] = '/Instances/minigames/cot.xml', ['survival'] = '/Instances/minigames/survivalR5.xml', ['andor'] = '/Instances/minigames/AndorTraining.xml', ['lyliya'] = '/Instances/minigames/Lyliya.xml', ['plant'] = '/Farm/PlantCare.xml', ['goldegg'] = '/Farm/MillersRanchChickens.xml', ['manastone'] = '/ManaStones/start.xml', ['gobo'] = '/instances/gobo/gobo_solo.xml',
['tq_prepare'] = '/TQ/TQ-Logar_prepare.xml', ['tq_patrouille'] = '/TQ/TQ-Patrouille.xml', ['tq_logar'] = '/TQ/TQ-Logar.xml', ['tq_dogs'] = '/TQ/TQ-Xaviera_dogs.xml', ['tq_butterfly'] = '/TQ/TQ-Xaviera_butterflies.xml', ['tq_xaviera'] = '/TQ/TQ-Xaviera.xml', ['tq_kadun'] = '/TQ/TQ-Kadun.xml', ['tq_meisterkoch'] = '/TQ/TQ-Meisterkoch.xml', ['tq_kisten'] = '/TQ/TQ-Kisten.xml', ['tq_ruinen'] = '/TQ/TQ-Ruinen.xml', ['tq_flammen'] = '/TQ/TQ-Flammen.xml', ['tq_hornbestien'] = '/TQ/TQ-Hornbestienleder.xml', ['tq_maedchen'] = '/TQ/TQ-Maedchen.xml', }
if getAcc ()==47 then chars = { { name = 'Mainbänker', account = 47, char = 7, scripts = {'tq_prepare','tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Kräuterbänker', account = 47, char = 4, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Holzbänker', account = 47, char = 5, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Erzbänker', account = 47, char = 8, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Runenbänker', account = 47, char = 3, scripts = {'tq_logar'} }, { name = 'Statsbänker', account = 47, char = 6, scripts = {'tq_logar'} }, { name = 'Brisinga', account = 47, char = 1, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Vindictive', account = 47, char = 2, scripts = {'parcour','andor','tq_butterfly'} }, } end
if getAcc ()==68 then chars = { { name = 'Foodbänker', account = 68, char = 1, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Matsbänker', account = 68, char = 2, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Manabänker', account = 68, char = 3, scripts = {'tq_logar'} }, { name = 'Steinbänker', account = 68, char = 4, scripts = {'tq_logar'} }, { name = 'Restebänker', account = 68, char = 5, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Crapbänker', account = 68, char = 6, scripts = {'tq_logar'} }, { name = 'Dailybänker', account = 68, char = 7, scripts = {'tq_logar','manastone'} }, { name = 'Hexxxhexxx', account = 68, char = 8, scripts = {'parcour','andor','tq_butterfly'} }, } end
if getAcc ()==57 then chars = { { name = 'Thunderstrike', account = 57, char = 2, scripts = {'parcour','andor','tq_butterfly'} }, { name = 'Celesteria', account = 57, char = 3, scripts = {'parcour','andor','tq_dogs'} }, { name = 'Celestron', account = 57, char = 1, scripts = {'goldegg','parcour','survival','andor','gobo','tq_flammen'} }, { name = 'Schulani', account = 57, char = 4, scripts = {'goldegg','parcour','survival','andor','gobo'} }, } end
logFile = getExecutionPath ()..'/logs/'..getPlayerName ()..'.'..getDailyDate ("%Y%m%d")..'.txt' wpPath = getExecutionPath ()..'/waypoints/' selfFile = wpPath .. "/TQ"
local function createCharList () local cList = {} local data for _,data in ipairs (chars) do if #cList>0 and cList[#cList].account == data.account then table.insert (cList[#cList].chars, data.char) else table.insert (cList, { account = data.account, chars = {data.char} }) end end return cList end
local function createScriptList () local name = getPlayerName () local sList = {} local found = false local script,data for id,data in ipairs (chars) do if data.name == name then for _,script in pairs (data.scripts) do table.insert (sList, script) end found = true; end end if found==false then message ('no scripts found for '..name, true) end return sList end
local old_loadLastPaths = loadLastPaths or false function loadLastPath () if config then table.remove (config, 1) table.save (config, logFile) end loadPaths (selfFile) end
function checkRelog (When_Finished) if When_Finished == "relog" then ChangeChar() waitForLoadingScreen() loadPaths(__WPL.FileName) elseif When_Finished == "charlist" then LoginNextChar() loadPaths(__WPL.FileName) elseif When_Finished == "end" then error("finished",2) elseif When_Finished == nil then loadPaths ('tq_return') else loadPaths (When_Finished) end end
function getConfig () local saved = table.load (logFile) if saved~=nil and type (saved)=="table" then return saved else return createScriptList () end end
function logtrace() errorCallback() logInfo (player.Name, debug.traceback(), true, "crashes") end
atError(logtrace)
soundOff () savePlayerName () config = getConfig ()
if config[1]~=nil then table.save (config, logFile) local next = ((type(config[1])=='table') and config[1]) or { config[1] } loadPaths (wpPath .. scripts[next[1]]) else cleanupBags () print ('\a\a\a') --yrest (5000) player:sleep () message ('finished - login next char') RoMScript ("CloseAllWindows ()") soundOn () SetCharList (createCharList ()) LoginNextChar () loadProfile () loadPaths (selfFile) end
